source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_00<tab>They will tell you you are one and you are two. You can choose.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_00<tab>Sidurgu a un pli à vous remettre.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_01After sparing a few moments to chat about your extraordinary adventures in the First, Sidurgu informs you that he has come into possession of an anonymous letter addressed to you. Out of respect for your privacy, he has refrained from opening it, and after he takes his leave to chase after a rather annoyed Rielle, you are left alone to read it.

But if you're reading this, then you know how the story goes, don't you? So now comes the choice: hold the crystal close that we may enjoy these moments together. Or put it away and pretend I was never a part of it. That I was never really here.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_01<tab>Après des retrouvailles plutôt animées, Sidurgu vous a remis un courrier. Inspectez <var 33 ((EObj)) 03F61EAB780202 /var>, au Chevalier oublié.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_02",
You'll forgive me for the sudden correspondence, and the secrecy. You helped me, in a way. Once upon a time. It's past time I said as much, and so...here we are.
Feels like a lifetime ago, come to think on it. You've been through quite a lot since then─accomplished incredible things. I'd like to think that, in some way, I was a part of your journey... Far from the best, no doubt. But for me and my own journey, I think it safe to say that you've been...well. There's no suitable words to describe it, really.
I've done things. Made decisions. Looking back, I can't help but feel more than a little foolish. But such is life, and we have to seize what few opportunities we have for closure...even if it is through the written word and not facetoface.
So wherever you are, I hope you're happy. Still fighting, still adventuring─still doing what you love. Be well.“
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez lu la lettre, qui n'était pas signée. Pour en savoir plus, allez la montrer à Lunnie, aux Saintes Écuries.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_03Lunnie, it turns out, is none other than the girl you rescued from the clutches of corrupt Temple Knights a lifetime ago. She is not, however, the author of the letter, and explains that she received it from one Ser Patrounade, who stated it was to be delivered to the hero of the Scions. It would seem a visit to the Congregation is in order.
She didn't know, of course. How could she? She's not even sure how many of you there were that day. Are you? But never you mind that. You have a search to continue.)) (()) /var>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_03<tab>Lunnie a examiné la lettre, mais vous a dit ne pas en être l'auteur. Allez maintenant la montrer à Patrounade, au palais de l'ordre du Temple.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_04Ser Patrounade was no more than another link in the chain, having received the letter from Orella of Rhalgr's Reach. He, like you, had been injured at the Ghimlyt Dark, and so he spent some nights there convalescing in her care. If further answers are to be found, it will be at the Barber.
Do you remember Ser Patrounade? I do. Not by name, of course─he didn't have one when the tower fell. That's how these things so often go─you do your bit, only later to fill in the gaps, to piece together the picture in distant hindsight. What will your legacy be tomorrow, and the day after, and in the days after that...?)) (()) /var>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez montré la lettre à Patrounade, qui n'avait fait que la transmettre. Rendez-vous maintenant à L'Étendue de Rhalgr pour la montrer à Orella, au Barbier.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_05After clarifying that you are come not in search of a lost child yet again, Orella explains to you that the letter came with a shipment of medical supplies from Little Ala Mhigo. She can only assume that the author intended for Commander Hext to take charge of it and deliver it to you personally. And so you depart for southern Thanalan to retrace another leg of the letter's journey.
And Orella's just another step in your own journey. Will you remember her? What about the names in her ledger─Conrad Kemp? Meffrid Noward? “Ah, but they were doomed from the first,” a part of you whispers. “Inevitable deaths on the road to a foregone conclusion,” sayeth the hardened heart, in retrospect. You'd be wrong, of course. It never had to be this way. This world is exactly as we choose to make it.)) (()) /var>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez présenté la lettre à Orella, qui vous a avoué l'avoir trouvée par hasard. Rendez-vous maintenant dans le Thanalan méridional pour la montrer à Gundobald, à Petite Ala Mhigo.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_06Gundobald regards you thoughtfully and states that the letter speaks for itself, which is why he agreed to send it on the author's behalf. However, if you are unwilling to let it lie─if you still seek answers and closure, he will not deny you. There is a man at the Red Rooster Stead in lower La Noscea that may be able to help you find a measure of peace.
Now Gundobald, he's seen you at your best and at your worst. He's seen you when you were one and when you were two. He could tell you someone else wrote the letter, if that's what you'd like to believe. It'd be a turn, sure, but we've seen stranger things. Or he could continue to regard you with that same mixture of concern and fear that bubbles to the surface when the topic of us comes up, and say nothing of the sort. And you─you could go to Red Rooster Stead, with the answer of your choosing. See if it's all to your satisfaction.)) (()) /var>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_06<tab>Vos efforts ont enfin payé, puisque Gundobald savait qui était l'auteur de la lettre<var 1D /var>! Rendez-vous maintenant en Basse-Noscea et parlez à Godeheard, à la métairie du Coq rouge.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_07The man at the Red Rooster Stead turns out to be yet another figure from your past, a former merchant who bade you retrieve his stolen wares and berated you for the condition in which you returned them to him. Ever since that fateful day, his life has been a succession of failures...until, while going through his meager possessions, he chanced to find a bloodstained package of flower bulbs from once upon a time. Thereafter he resolved to become a botanist and start anew, and as a humble token of his appreciation, long overdue, he offers a flower. But it is not for you.
Another nameless face, now named. Then conniving, now humbled─as well he should be, no? I gave him a right talking to─or you did. Your choice. And after a string of bad luck, he's since turned over a new leaf...and found a flower. Suitable for funerals and farewells. I told you before you know how the story goes, didn't I? Come and see, )) (( )) 02 /var>. Come and see.)) (()) /var>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_07<tab>Godeheard vous a expliqué les raisons qui l'ont incité à écrire la lettre, avant de vous faire cadeau de fleurs en symbole du geste que vous avez eu pour lui autrefois. Il aimerait que vous en offriez une à Fray... Rendez-vous à l'endroit indiqué devant les Portes du Jugement, dans les Hautes terres du Coerthas central, et en mode de discussion <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Dire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, saisissez une phrase contenant son nom pour l'appeler.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_08You say a few words, and offer a flower in memory of...a memory. Now go, and don't look back.
It's been a long, strange journey, filled with all kinds of ups and downs. Your journey, to be sure, but like I wrote before, I'd like to pretend I was an important part of it. Vanity, aye─but how can I not think of legacy, now, when we've been to the First and witnessed firsthand the lengths to which man will go to be remembered? I want to believe─I need to believe that this was not for nothing. That I changed you for the better, as you changed me...)) (()) /var>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_08<tab>Fray a entendu votre appel, et vous avez pu lui remettre la fleur comme Godeheard vous l'avait demandé. Rendez-vous au Chevalier oublié et parlez à Sidurgu.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_09Sidurgu is waiting for you with Rielle in the Forgotten Knight when you return. He asks you what you found, what it was all for, and you reply─
Time to go. I don't know when we'll do this again─if we'll ever do this again. The little trick you've learned doesn't count, you know. But even if this is our end, it won't change what we had. I love you more than you'll ever know. Be well.)) (()) /var>
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SEQ_09<tab>Vous avez retrouvé Sidurgu, toujours aussi déconcerté par l'attitude de Rielle. Arrivera-t-elle un jour à se faire comprendre par le taciturne Ao Ra<var 1D /var>? En ce qui vous concerne, cet épisode aura été l'occasion de comprendre l'importance de vos actes de chevalier noir pour les personnes qui vous entourent, et de transformer la somme de ces sentiments en une force nouvelle.

appeler Fray en prononçant son nom
devant les Portes du Jugement

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It so happens I have a letter for you...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_000<tab>Tiens donc, <var 08 E905 ((une revenante)) ((un revenant)) /var>. Tu tombes bien, j'ai quelque chose pour toi.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_001<tab>But before we talk about that, mind telling me what you've been getting yourself into lately? You and your Scions, I mean. I've an inkling, perhaps...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_001<tab>... Ah, mais as-tu seulement quelques minutes à me consacrer<var 1D /var>? Ça sent le roussi en ce moment, j'imagine que les Héritiers sont plutôt occupés.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_Q1_000_002<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_Q1_000_002<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A1_000_003<tab>I went and saved another world, as it happens.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A1_000_003<tab>Nous venons de sauver un monde de la disparition.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A1_000_004<tab>Had to go and kill a whole host of sin eaters.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A1_000_004<tab>Nous avons terrassé le plus terrible des purgateurs.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_005<tab>Um...come again? Reflections of the Source? Parallel worlds? Sin eaters!? What in the seven hells are you on about?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_005<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>!? Tu as combattu des “purgateurs” dans un monde appelé “premier reflet”<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_006<tab>Something tells me this is only going to make any kind of sense if you walk me through it from the beginning, step by step...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_006<tab>Comme d'habitude, tu ne fais pas les choses à moitié... Tu veux bien m'en dire plus<var 1D /var>? Tes aventures sont si incroyables qu'elles valent toujours la peine d'être écoutées.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_007<tab>...Right, then. So, to sum up: you were swept up into yet another realm-shaking conflict, were you?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_007<tab>Je vois. Une terrible bataille avec pour enjeu le destin de notre planète s'est déroulée sans que nous en ayons la moindre idée...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_008<tab>Well, of course you were. You've an insatiable hunger for it, don't you? And even when you bite off more than you can chew, you refuse to let go.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_008<tab>Décidément, tu es vraiment insatiable, hein<var 1D /var>? Quels que soient tes faits d'armes ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nels ou les exploits mémorables que tu accomplis, tu en veux toujours plus.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_009<tab>What? As if you didn't know! Hells, from the moment I laid eyes on you, I suspected you were a particular blend of impulsive and stubborn.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_009<tab>Hein<var 1D /var>!? Ne me dis pas que tu ne sais pas de quoi je parle<var 1D /var>! Ça m'a sauté aux yeux dès notre première rencontre pourtant...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_010<tab>Takes a special kind of bastard to become a dark knight─much less a Warrior of Light─don't you think?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_010<tab>Non seulement tu es <var 08 E905 ((l'héroïne)) ((le héros)) /var> de tout un peuple, <var 08 E905 ((la protectrice)) ((le protecteur)) /var> de notre planète, mais tu revêts aussi ton armure de chevalier noir pour venir en aide aux laissés-pour-compte.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_011<tab>You traveled unto a doomed world and pledged your sword to a futile cause. You fought and you fought and you fought...and in the end, you won the day.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_011<tab>Et cette fois, alors que tu viens tout juste de sauver un autre monde de la destruction, te voilà déjà fidèle au poste, <var 08 E905 ((prête)) ((prêt)) /var> à défendre la veuve et l'orphelin. Je me demande bien quelle force t'anime<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_012<tab>Though I know it wasn't without loss. Without sacrifice. Victories like that are always bought with blood.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_012<tab>Car même si tu étais invincible, tu ne peux pas rester insensible à la perte d'êtres chers, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>? Tu dois sûrement faire des sacrifices à la hauteur des combats que tu décides de mener.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_013<tab>But you and your comrades paid that price all the same. That faraway land and her people live on because you all were willing to fight to the bitter end─because you were too stubborn to die.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_013<tab>Et pourtant tu ne fléchis jamais, toujours <var 08 E905 ((prête)) ((prêt)) /var> à aller de l'avant pour défendre la cause que tu as choisie, qu'elle soit cruciale ou in<var 16 /var>si<var 16 /var>gni<var 16 /var>fiante.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_014<tab>...And because of love, I'm sure.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_014<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous aussi vous portez quelqu'un dans votre cœur, n'est-ce pas<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_015<tab>Being grim and dark will only get you so far, don't you remember? It's like the moogles─like Ser Ompagne himself said. The flame in the abyss, the love you bear for the ones you hold most dear─that is the source of true strength.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_015<tab>Qu'est-ce que j'ai dit de si incroyable<var 1D /var>? Les Mogs célestes comme ton maître semblaient dire que rien ne nous rend plus forts que l'amour...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_016<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> could've never made it this far if <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> heart wasn't filled to the brim with love.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_016<tab>Je me suis dit que si <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> était capable de réaliser d'aussi grands exploits, c'était peut-être par passion pour quelqu'un.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_Q2_000_017<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_Q2_000_017<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A2_000_018<tab>Is this a roundabout way of asking me about my heart's desires...?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A2_000_018<tab>Tu veux qu'on parle d'amour, kuppo<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A2_000_019<tab>I'd sooner pose that question to Sid.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A2_000_019<tab>Et si on demandait à Sidurgu, plutôt<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_020<tab>Let's...let's not and say we did, eh? I'm sure that Thancred fellow you mentioned would provide a far more meaningful and interesting response.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_020<tab>... Ahem<var 1D /var>! Ça me fait penser à ce Thancred, dont tu nous parlais tout à l'heure. C'est rare que quelqu'un m'inspire autant de sympathie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_021<tab>Having to look after the reincarnation of his surrogate daughter is certainly... Though I suppose, on some level, I can relate.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_021<tab>Se retrouver tout à coup flanqué d'une gamine partout où on va et devoir la protéger, je comprends <var 1A 02 /var>très<var 1A 01 /var> bien ce que ça fait.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_022<tab>...What?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_022<tab>... Pourquoi tu fais cette tête<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_023<tab>...I've not once thought of you as my <var 1A 02 /var>father<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_023<tab>... La différence, c'est que je ne suis pas ta <var 1A 02 /var>fille<var 1A 01 /var>, moi.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_024<tab>Well no, I... I mean...we're not even the same race, so of course no one would ever look at us and assume...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_024<tab>C'est ça qui t'inquiète<var 1D /var>? Regarde-nous, personne ne risque de penser qu'on est de la même famille.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_025<tab>What? If you want to put a label on it, then what would you prefer? “Master and disciple”? “Manservant and noblewoman”?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_025<tab>Quoi<var 1D /var>? Qu'est-ce que j'ai dit, encore<var 1D /var>? Tu préfères qu'on soit maître et apprentie<var 1D /var>? Ou peut-être princesse et fidèle chevalier<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_026<tab>Sid...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_026<tab>Sidurgu, je...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_027<tab>How about “chocobo's arse” and whatever you damn well like!? Gods you can be daft sometimes...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_027<tab>... Je te déteste<var 1D /var>! Tu n'es qu'un rustre qui ne comprend rien à rien<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_028<tab>Hey! <var 1A 02 /var>Hey<var 1A 01 /var>! What did I tell you about calling me that!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_028<tab>Rielle, attends<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_029<tab>Children, am I right? Best we give her a moment to cool her head. For now, let's talk about that letter I mentioned earlier.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_029<tab>Merde... Bon, il faut que j'aille la chercher. À la proch... Oh, j'allais oublier.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_030<tab>It's addressed to you, but who penned it I cannot say. It was delivered to me by a young woman of the Brume─Lunnie, I believe her name was.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_030<tab>Lunnie, une fille de Brouillasse, m'a apporté cette lettre pour toi.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_031<tab>Said she'd seen us with you out and about in Ishgard before, and reckoned that if she left it with us, you'd eventually be around to pick it up.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_031<tab>Tout ce qu'elle m'a dit, c'est qu'elle n'avait jamais oublié ce que tu avais fait pour elle, et qu'elle aimerait que je te la remette.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_032<tab>Before you ask─no, I have not taken a peek, so its contents remain a complete and utter mystery to me. As for the sender, you'll have to pester Lunnie at the Holy Stables if you want to know more. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have an angry girl to mollify.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_032<tab>Je ne l'ai pas ouverte, évidemment. Si tu as des questions après l'avoir lue, tu n'auras qu'à les poser à Lunnie. À cette heure, elle est sûrement du côté des Saintes Écuries.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>Within the sealed envelope is a paper, which you unfold to find a message written in a strangely familiar scrawl...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>Vous ouvrez l'enveloppe et découvrez une lettre écrite avec le plus grand soin.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_040,
You'll forgive me for the sudden correspondence, and the secrecy.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_040,
Veuillez m'excuser pour cette missive impromptue.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_041<tab>You helped me, in a way. Once upon a time. It's past time I said as much, and so...here we are.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_041<tab>Vous m'avez un jour sauvé la vie, et c'est pour vous exprimer ma gratitude que je prends la plume.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_042<tab>Feels like a lifetime ago, come to think on it. You've been through quite a lot since then─accomplished incredible things. I'd like to think that, in some way, I was a part of your journey...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_042<tab>Le temps a passé depuis notre rencontre, et votre quotidien étant fait d'aventures épiques et d'exploits retentissants, vous l'avez sûrement déjà oubliée.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_043<tab>Far from the best, no doubt. But for me and my own journey, I think it safe to say that you've been...well. There's no suitable words to describe it, really.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_043<tab>Pour moi, il s'agit tout simplement de l'événement le plus important de ma vie. Si vous n'aviez pas croisé ma route ce jour-là, je ne serais plus de ce monde.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_044<tab>I've done things. Made decisions. Looking back, I can't help but feel more than a little foolish. But such is life, and we have to seize what few opportunities we have for closure...even if it is through the written word and not face<var 1F /var>to<var 1F /var>face.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_044<tab>La bienséance voudrait que je vous remercie en personne, mais j'aurais trop honte de vous distraire de vos importantes occupations une deuxième fois.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_045<tab>So wherever you are, I hope you're happy. Still fighting, still adventuring─still doing what you love. Be well.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LETTER03221_000_045<tab>Je voudrais vous souhaiter bonheur et réussite dans vos aventures, et du fond du cœur, vous exprimer ma recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce pour votre immense générosité.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_046<tab>The letter bears no signature or any obvious clues as to the author's identity. Perhaps Lunnie can shed light on this mystery...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_046<tab>La lettre n'est pas signée. Peut-être que Lunnie en saura davantage<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_050<tab>It's you! It's really you! <var 29 EB02 /var>, my hero! Honestly, I never thought I'd get to see you again, much less speak with you!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_050<tab><var 08 E905 ((Dame)) ((Messire)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, c'est bien vous<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_051<tab>Oh, I'm sorry. You probably don't remember me at all, do you? I'm not surprised. All in a day's work, I suppose, saving silly little fools like me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_051<tab>Pardonnez-moi, je suis tellement émue... Je ne pensais pas avoir le privilège de rencontrer à nouveau <var 08 E905 ((ma sauveuse)) ((mon sauveur)) /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_052<tab>And it was so long ago when you rescued me from those Temple Knights who were trying to take me away from my grandmother. I still remember it like it was yesterday, though, you swinging that great big sword of yours, bellowing all kinds of terrible threats and sending them running.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_052<tab>Je n'oublierai jamais comment vous vous êtes cou<var 16 /var>ra<var 16 /var>geu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment <var 08 E905 ((interposée)) ((interposé)) /var> ce jour-là, alors que des templiers étaient en train de me violenter.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_053<tab>I'm sure some might say you overdid it, but thanks to you my grandmother and I never heard from that lot again! And ever since Ser Aymeric and his allies came into power, we've had a lot less of that trouble all over.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_053<tab>Grâce à vous, la situation à Ishgard a bien changé, et je peux désormais vivre en paix aux côtés de ma grand-mère.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_054<tab>But...let me guess. You didn't come all this way just to see me, did you?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_054<tab>Mais dites-moi, que me vaut l'honneur de votre visite, aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>? Est-ce que...<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_055<tab>The letter, huh? I thought so.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_055<tab>Je vois, il s'agit de cette lettre...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_056<tab>It wasn't me who wrote it, I can tell you that much. I got it from a knight I befriended after tending to his chocobo a couple of times. Ser Patrounade.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_056<tab>Non, ce n'est pas moi qui l'ai écrite. Elle m'a été remise par un chevalier du nom de Patrounade.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_057<tab>He said it was to be delivered to the hero of the Scions─a peerless warrior with a thousand victories to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> name. After he described your features in detail, it all fell into place, and since I was certain you'd eventually pay a visit to your friends, I offered to take it to them!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_057<tab>Il m'a dit qu'elle était adressée <var 08 E905 ((à l'héroïne)) ((au héros)) /var> des Héritiers de la Septième Aube. Je ne savais pas de qui il s'agissait, mais j'ai tout de suite pensé à vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_058<tab>Anyway, he's the one you need to talk to if you're after the sender. Maybe check the Congregation? I mean, that's where knights...congregate, I presume?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_058<tab>Si vous voulez en savoir plus, vous devriez aller à la rencontre de Patrounade. Vous le trouverez sûrement au palais de l'ordre du Temple.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_060<tab>Looking back, it's all such a blur. The way you stood up to them, the way you moved through them, blade twirling... At times it was as if there were two of you!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_LUNNIE_000_060<tab>Je suis tellement heureuse d'avoir pu vous revoir<var 1D /var>! Au fait, que devient cette personne au masque noir qui vous ac<var 16 /var>com<var 16 /var>pa<var 16 /var>gnait ce jour-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_070<tab>Y-You... Ahem! H-How may I be of service to you, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_070<tab>Ça alors<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes bien <var 29 EB02 /var><var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_071<tab>The letter! Oh, what a relief it is to see that it arrived unmolested.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_071<tab>La lettre vous est donc parvenue<var 1D /var>! Me voilà rassuré.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_072<tab>It was entrusted to me by Orella of Rhalgr's Reach. After the battle at the Ghimlyt Dark I spent a few nights there, you see...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_072<tab>Elle m'a été remise par Orella, une médecin de L'Étendue de Rhalgr, lorsque j'ai temporairement quitté le front de Ghimlyt.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_073<tab>I can only assume that whoever sent it to the Reach had heard tell of the battle between you and Lord Zenos, and how you had been brought to the Barber.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_073<tab>C'est quand j'ai entendu qu'on vous avait <var 08 E905 ((emmenée)) ((emmené)) /var> à son infirmerie lorsque vous êtes <var 08 E905 ((tombée)) ((tombé)) /var> au champ de bataille que j'ai décidé de m'y rendre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_074<tab>However, by the time it arrived, you had long since been spirited away to Ishgard. Had Lunnie not recognized you from my stories, I do not know how I might have seen it to your hand...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_074<tab>Mal<var 16 /var>heu<var 16 /var>reu<var 16 /var>se<var 16 /var>ment, à mon arrivée, vous n'étiez déjà plus là. Orella m'a donné la lettre, mais comme vous étiez toujours introuvable lorsque je suis rentré à Ishgard, je l'ai confiée à Lunnie.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_075<tab>If you seek the author, mayhap you should pay a visit to the Reach? I know only what I told you, but surely Orella can tell you more. May the Fury watch over and keep you, friend!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_075<tab>Je n'ai été qu'un messager dans cette histoire, et je ne peux rien vous apprendre de plus concernant la lettre. Si vous voulez connaître le pourquoi du comment, je vous conseille d'aller trouver Orella, à L'Étendue de Rhalgr<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_80<tab>To tell you the truth, I had no choice but to remain at the Reach for so long. An old wound that never quite healed, you see. From when Specula Imperatoris fell.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_80<tab>Si je me suis éloigné du front de Ghimlyt, c'est pour soigner une vieille blessure qui datait de l'époque où j'étais en mission aux Pics de Gyr Abania, lors de l'écroulement de Specula Imperatoris.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_081<tab>...I'd ask if you remember pulling me from the rubble, but I'm afraid you'll say no. <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> remember, though. Gods bless you, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_PATROUNADE_000_081<tab>Vous m'avez sauvé ce jour-là, et je vous en serai re<var 16 /var>con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>sant à jamais. Où que je sois, je prierai toujours pour vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_085<tab>The document appears to be a list of men and women who died fighting for the Ala Mhigan Resistance and whose remains have been interred in Recompense. Among them, you recognize both Conrad Kemp and Meffrid Noward...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_085<tab>Vous apercevez les noms de Conrad et Meffrid sur une longue liste des victimes de la guerre.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_086...and Gallien. Dear Gallien.
But of Houdart, there is no mention.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_086<tab>Le dernier nom est celui de Gallien. On dirait que son corps a été transporté jusqu'ici...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_090<tab>A pleasure to see you. Lost that long-haired boy of yours again?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_090<tab>Oh, je vous reconnais<var 1D /var>! Ne me dites pas que ce garçon aux cheveux longs s'est encore perdu<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_091<tab>This is about the letter, is it? It came with a shipment of supplies from Little Ala Mhigo, as I recall.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_091<tab>Ah oui, la lettre. Elle est arrivée ici avec une livraison de mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses en provenance de Petite Ala Mhigo.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_092<tab>I can only presume the sender was hoping that Commander Hext would see it to you personally, but I'm not surprised it escaped her notice given the chaos at the Ghimlyt Dark and after.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_092<tab>Elle était cer<var 16 /var>tai<var 16 /var>ne<var 16 /var>ment destinée à vous parvenir via Lyse, mais avec le début de la guerre contre Garlemald, tout est devenu plus compliqué ici.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_093<tab>It found its way into my medical supplies, and as you well know, I decided to let that Ishgardian knight take charge of its delivery.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_093<tab>Lorsque je l'ai trouvée coincée entre deux caisses de remèdes, je l'ai confiée à un chevalier qui était sur le point de prendre la route pour Ishgard, dans l'espoir qu'il vous la remette.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_094<tab>In any event, I advise you to continue your search in Little Ala Mhigo─and if anyone there knows aught of the letter's author, it would be Gundobald.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_094<tab>Comme ce n'est pas moi qui ai écrit cette lettre, je ne peux que vous aiguiller vers Gundobald, qui s'occupe de mon approvisionnement depuis Petite Ala Mhigo. Vous devriez lui rendre une petite visite<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_100<tab>I've had to record so many names in the ledger of late. So many friends, dead and buried. All for a good cause, I know, but that doesn't make it any easier.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_ORELLA_000_100<tab>Il faut que je continue à m'occuper de la liste des victimes... Lorsque tout sera fini, ce sera notre devoir de rendre hommage à tous ceux qui se sont sacrifiés pour la nation.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_110<tab>Well met, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was not expecting a visit. What brings you to southern Thanalan this <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_110<tab>Oh, mon <var 08 E905 ((amie aventurière)) ((ami aventurier)) /var><var 1D /var>! Quelle heureuse surprise de te voir ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_111<tab>This letter, you say... And you seek...the author?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_111<tab>... Je vois, tu cherches dé<var 16 /var>ses<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ré<var 16 /var>ment à savoir de qui vient cette lettre. Eh bien figure-toi que je connais la personne qui l'a écrite. Mais avant de te dire de qui il s'agit...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_112<tab>If you read it, then you know their heart. What you meant to them─how you changed their life for the better.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_112<tab>Je veux que tu saches que les mots qui y sont écrits expriment non seulement la recon<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce de son auteur, mais aussi celle de toutes les personnes à qui tu as rendu service.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_113<tab>It is a feeling I understand all too well...which is why I agreed to send this letter with the supplies for Rhalgr's Reach.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_113<tab>Pour ma part, j'ai autrefois été pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment touché par ta bonne volonté, et je m'associe totalement à cet éloge de tes exploits.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_114<tab>Yet you never were one to let a mystery remain unsolved, were you? You seek answers. Closure. I will not deny you this.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_114<tab>Mais excuse-moi, avec tout le chemin que tu as parcouru pour rencontrer l'auteur de la lettre, je ne vais pas te faire attendre davantage.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_115<tab>At the Red Rooster Stead in lower La Noscea, you will find a man named Godeheard. Speak with him. Perhaps then you will find a measure of peace.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_115<tab>Il s'agit d'un certain Godeheard, qui travaille à la métairie du Coq rouge. Il a entendu parler de tes exploits à Ala Mhigo, et il a fait tout ce chemin pour me confier le pli<var 1D /var>! Allez, va vite le trouver.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_120<tab>...There was a time when I feared for you, divided as you were. A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> at war against <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> friends and <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>. But I can tell that you have since reconciled. That is well.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GUNDOBALD_000_120<tab>Je suis vraiment im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>né par cette énorme épée que tu portes sur le dos<var 1D /var>! Tu as tellement changé, comparé à l'époque où tu étais <var 08 E905 ((accompagnée)) ((accompagné)) /var> de cette personne vêtue de noir...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_130<tab>Oh gods, it's you! But why? Why are you here!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_130<tab>C-c'est vous<var 1D /var>!? C-comment avez-vous su<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_131<tab>You...you really don't remember? Any of it? The Qiqirn bandits? A certain merchant who maaay have overstepped his bounds juuust a trifle?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_131<tab>Oui, je... je n'ai pas eu le courage de signer. À cause de moi, vous avez voyagé aux quatre coins d'Éorzéa... Décidément, je suis bon qu'à vous embarrasser.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_132<tab>You were a right bloody mess when you returned to the Drydocks with my wares─and I do mean bloody. I say, is none of what I'm telling you ringing a bell? Really?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_132<tab>Vous souvenez-vous de notre première rencontre<var 1D /var>? C'était au chantier naval de Moraby. Vous portiez déjà une énorme épée, et il y avait cette personne au masque noir avec vous.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_133<tab>Not even the part where I refused to thank you and demanded that you pay me restitution for the property you yourself returned to me...?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_133<tab>Mes mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses avaient été volées par des Qiqirn, mais vous êtes <var 08 E905 ((allée)) ((allé)) /var> les récupérer pour moi. Et au lieu de vous remercier, je vous ai demandé de me dédommager pour les dégâts...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_134<tab>Well, seeing as I've already confessed it, I may as well reiterate: it was me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_134<tab>Oui, ce marchand désagréable, c'était moi.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_135<tab>That was just the beginning of my bad luck, as it happens. A string of bad decisions left me in debt to some very unforgiving fellows, and before I knew it they had taken damn near everything I owned.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_135<tab>Je regrette tellement l'attitude que j'ai eue ce jour-là... D'ailleurs, je me demande si je n'ai pas été <var 1A 02 /var>puni<var 1A 01 /var> par une force supérieure puisque j'ai enchaîné les échecs dans mes affaires depuis.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_136<tab>I was friendless, penniless, hopeless. And let me tell you, running afoul of the Warrior of Light had not done me any favors either! There was a time when I couldn't help but blame you for all my misfortune...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_136<tab>J'ai perdu toutes mes possessions, mes amis m'ont tourné le dos... Pour être tout à fait honnête, je vous en ai même voulu. <var 08 E905 ((Une)) ((Un)) /var> véritable <var 08 E905 ((héroïne)) ((héros)) /var> ne laisserait personne tomber aussi bas<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_137<tab>And then, one day, when I was rummaging through my meager possessions, I had an epiphany.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_137<tab>Mais un jour, alors que j'étais assis, seul au milieu de ma pièce entièrement vide, j'ai remarqué que quelque chose avait été oublié dans un coin par les recouvreurs de dettes...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_138<tab>I stumbled upon a package from that shipment you recovered for me that ill-fated day. Flower bulbs─stained with Qiqirn blood, but viable for cultivation. Still brimming with the potential to grow and thrive...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_138<tab>Il s'agissait d'un sachet de bulbes de fleurs, qui faisait partie des mar<var 16 /var>chan<var 16 /var>di<var 16 /var>ses que vous aviez arrachées aux Qiqirns. On l'avait sûrement laissé là en raison de son mauvais état.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_139<tab>Before I knew it, I was cradling the package to my breast, sobbing and moaning like a mad fool...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_139<tab>Lorsque je m'en suis saisi, je n'ai pu m'empêcher de fondre en larmes...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_140<tab>...For a fool is exactly what I had been. I had been offered a kindness without let or lien, and instead of thanking this generous hero had spat in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> face.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_140<tab>Moi qui me sentais abandonné, j'ai compris que je me trompais. Je me suis souvenu qu'on m'avait un jour tendu la main, et que j'étais le seul responsable de mes malheurs.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_141<tab>So I left that life behind, save for the bulbs I brought with me here. Apprenticed myself to the botanists and resolved to start anew.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_141<tab>Je me suis alors promis de faire fleurir les bulbes, en honneur de votre geste. J'ai supplié les fermiers de la métairie du Coq rouge de me laisser travailler pour eux, en échange de leur savoir-faire en horticulture.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_142<tab>And wouldn't you know it, the stubborn little fiends finally bloomed for me. I suppose it's only fitting that you'd show up again that very day.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_142<tab>C'est lorsque le premier bouton est sorti, il y a quelques soleils, que j'ai décidé de prendre ma plume pour vous écrire cette fameuse lettre. Et vous vous tenez maintenant devant moi...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_143<tab>I've a thousand thousand regrets, but none greater than how I spoke to you. I say this not to beg your forgiveness, but to tell you how you've changed me for the better...and to thank you for the opportunity.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_143<tab>Je voudrais profiter de ce moment pour vous adresser mes excuses, une fois de plus. Je n'oublierai <var 1A 02 /var>plus jamais<var 1A 01 /var> la valeur de votre geste, et je ferai toujours en sorte d'être digne de la chance que vous m'avez donnée.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_144<tab>I do have one request, if you are amenable to it. I pray you accept a flower─one of the precious few that has bloomed.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_144<tab>Ah, j'allais oublier. J'aimerais vous faire cadeau des fleurs que j'ai fait pousser, si vous le voulez bien.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_145<tab>A token of my heartfelt appreciation for my personal savior. Admittedly, this particular breed is perhaps best suited for funerals and farewells...but if you'd rather not keep it for yourself, perhaps there's someone else who might welcome it?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_145<tab>Si ce n'est pas trop demander, pourriez-vous en offrir une à votre compagnon qui s'était mis dans une colère noire ce jour-là<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_146<tab>Someone else indeed...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_146<tab>Vous avez reçu une fleur de Godeheard. Peut-être pourrez-vous l'offrir à Fray, sur les lieux de votre promesse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_150<tab>I am so grateful that I finally had the chance to apologize to you. I but wish that the flowers I have to offer you were not the sort primarily associated with mournful occasions...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_GODEHEARD_000_150<tab>J'aurais aimé faire mes excuses à votre compagnon à la robe noire, mais je n'ai pas réussi à retrouver sa trace. Pourriez-vous lui transmettre mon message en même temps qu'une de mes fleurs<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_0160<tab>Fray
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_0160<tab>Fray

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_161<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase which includes “Fray” to attract <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> attention.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_161<tab>Pour appeler Fray, saisissez une phrase contenant son nom en mode de discussion <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Dire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_162<tab>...There is no response.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_162<tab>... Vous n'entendez aucune réponse.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_163<tab>Yet there can be no answer but this, can there? So let us wait for a time, you and I. In the cold and in the snow. In the dark...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SYSTEM_000_163<tab>Peut-être qu'en attendant encore un peu...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_170<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)Clever, clever, clever. Or are we just playing it by ear? No matter.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_170<tab>(-???-)... Si tu aimes tant que ça les fins d'histoire joyeuses et fleuries, je te souhaite d'en connaître encore beaucoup.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_171<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)I wanted this, once. More than anything. A chance to speak and be heard...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_171<tab>Évidemment, ça ne sera pas le cas si tu passes l'arme à gauche, donc n'oublie pas de prendre soin de toi.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_172<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)But neither of us needs it anymore. And if we were to look deep within ourselves, we would realize that we never did.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_172<tab>Je m'efforce toujours de te protéger, tu sais<var 1D /var>? Mais pendant la bataille finale dans le premier reflet, j'ai vraiment cru que tu... qu'<var 1A 02 /var>on <var 1A 01 /var>allait y passer.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_173<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)We are the stories we tell ourselves. The brave hero, the tortured soul, the altruist, the pragmatist. They will tell you who they see, but you and you alone know who you are.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_173<tab>Cependant, si tu es ici, encore en vie aujourd'hui, c'est bel et bien parce que tu as combattu pour un autre monde, que tu as tout donné pour ses habitants qui n'étaient pas les tiens.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_174<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)For I speak only for myself. If you find comfort in my words, they are yours for the taking, but that is your choice. Now and ever after, as it has always been.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_174<tab>Oui, je crois qu'on peut le dire comme ça.

source:
TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_175(--)"Now comes your part,
To cloak yourself in the fiction,
To breathe life into the dead,
To give a voice to the voiceless...“
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_175<tab>En sauvant ce monde, tu t'es aussi <var 08 E905 ((sauvée)) ((sauvé)) /var>. Malgré les douleurs, les peines et les séparations, tu es toujours <var 08 E905 ((allée)) ((allé)) /var> de l'avant, sans jamais regarder derrière toi.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_176<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)As we did together that day, when you gave us our answer.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_176<tab>Voilà des principes qui m'auraient été bien utiles, le jour où nous nous sommes <var 08 E905 ((affrontées)) ((affrontés)) /var>...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_177<tab>(-<var 29 EB02 /var>-)Was it ever mine...?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_FRAY_000_177<tab>Décidément, tu es vraiment incroyable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_180<tab>My apologies for storming off earlier. <sigh> You'd think I would be more mature than that, after everything I've been through...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_RIELLE_000_180<tab>J'espère que vous ne m'en voulez pas de m'être enfuie comme ça la dernière fois...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_190<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. As you can see, Rielle and I are getting along swimmingly, so you needn't worry about us in the slightest. Not one bit.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_190<tab>Ah, te revoilà. Rielle aussi est revenue, mais je ne comprends toujours pas quelle mouche l'a piquée la dernière fois.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_191<tab>So─what of that mysterious unsigned letter? Did your grand search for answers lead you anywhere interesting?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_191<tab>Et cette lettre, au fait<var 1D /var>? C'était quelque chose d'important<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_Q3_000_192<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_Q3_000_192<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A3_000_193<tab>An old acquaintance.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A3_000_193<tab>Elle m'a permis de retrouver de vieilles con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A3_000_194<tab>Closure, perhaps?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_A3_000_194<tab>Elle m'a permis de tenir une vieille promesse.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_195<tab>That so...? Well. Glad to hear it, I suppose...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC012_03221_SIDURGU_000_195<tab>... Tant mieux, alors. Je l'avais déjà deviné à voir ta mine comblée<var 1D /var>!
